mapper.select: SELECT g.* FROM cart_item ci INNER JOIN goods g ON ci.goods_num = g.goods_num WHERE ci.cart_num = #{cartNum};

select g.goods_num, c.category_num,c.category_name, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity, f.file_path, f.file_system_name from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num join file f on g.goods_num = f.goods_num where c.category_num = #{categoryNum}

select g.goods_num, c.category_num,c.category_name, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity, f.file_path, f.file_system_name from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num join file f on g.goods_num = f.goods_num where g.goods_name Like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

select g.goods_num, c.category_num, g.goods_name, g.goods_price, g.goods_quantity, f.file_path, f.file_system_name from goods g join category c on g.category_num = c.category_num join file f on f.goods_num = g.goods_num where g.goods_num = #{goodsNum}

select goods_detail_image_number, goods_detail_image_path, goods_detail_image_original_name, goods_detail_image_system_name, goods_num from goods_detail_image where goods_num = #{goodsNum} order by goods_detail_image_number DESC
